question: CSIR-Central Mechanical Engineering Research Institute, which has developed COVID Protection System (COPS), is located in which state?
explanation:
CSIR-Central Mechanical Engineering Research Institute has developed COVID Protection System (COPS) for Workplace. It is located in Durgapur, West Bengal.
The system comprises of a contactless Solar Intelligent Mask Dispensing Unit and Thermal Scanner (IntelliMAST), Touchless Faucet (TouF) and a 360Â° Car Flusher. This would provide full protection to Healthcare Workers as well as the frontline Security Guards.
